mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(memId, cloPrdNo,fdPrdNo, cartQty) VALUES (#{memId}, #{cloPrdNo},#{fdPrdNo}, #{cartQty})
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cartQty = cartQty + #{cartQty} WHERE (cloPrdNo=#{cloPrdNo} AND memId=#{memId}) OR (fdPrdNo=#{fdPrdNo} AND memId=#{memId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNo, cp.cloPrdNo, cp.cloPrdImg, cp.cloPrdName, cp.cloPrdPrice, c.cartQty, c.memId,cp.cloPrdCost FROM clothosproduct cp, cart c WHERE cp.cloPrdNo = c.cloPrdNo AND c.memId=#{memId} ORDER BY c.cartNo
SELECT c.cartNo, fp.fdPrdNo, fp.fdPrdImg, fp.fdPrdName, fp.fdPrdPrice, c.cartQty, c.memId,fp.fdPrdCost FROM foodproduct fp, cart c WHERE fp.fdPrdNo = c.fdPrdNo AND c.memId=#{memId} ORDER BY c.cartNo
